sentences.sContent: Whereas if only I and a couple of other people like it, then it must be really something special.
sentences.sContent_eng: Whereas if only I and a couple of other people like it, then it must be really something special.
sentences.sCn: 然而，如果只有我自己和几个别的什么人喜欢，那么它一定真的很特别了。

sentences.sContent: For instance, "in her family there were a couple of other queens and princesses that had atherosclerosis, so a genetic element cannot be excluded," Allam said.
sentences.sContent_eng: For instance, "in her family there were a couple of other queens and princesses that had atherosclerosis, so a genetic element cannot be excluded," Allam said.
sentences.sCn: 例如，奥勒姆说：”在她的家族里有两个皇后和两个公主患有动脉粥样硬化，所以基因是不能排除在外的因素。

sentences.sContent: We worked for a couple of weeks (off and on) and finally solved this problem.
sentences.sContent_eng: We worked for a couple of weeks (off and on) and finally solved this problem.
sentences.sCn: 我工作了两个周（断断续续的）最终解决了这个问题。
